content.description: Starting right of the first bolt requires a difficult traverse through a sloping horizontal crack. Starting left has less for feet but better holds. Either way, work your way up and to the right. Sustained climbing through the 4th bolt. Not using the holds on the arete to the left makes this route significantly more difficult.
content.location: Overhanging route on the right side slot machine.

content.description: Move through a crack system to a high first bolt. Pull a small lip then work your way right to holds on the arete. Make a somewhat awkward 3rd clip and either top out or move directly right around the arete to the anchors above slot machine.
content.protection: 3 bolts. No anchors directly above the climb. Anchors accessible to the right.
content.location: Left route on Slot Machine around the arete.

content.description: Small outcropping across the wash to the south of major wall and alcohol wall. It gets some morning sun and afternoon shade during the winter months. The rock has two routes.
